title: Rune Page Woes

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
As you can see in the attached image there is a screencap of the rune pages from the legacy and beta client.

In the legacy client the statistics panel listed in plain text the sum total of the runes (Attack Speed % +20%)

However in the beta client there are just a bunch of icons with some numbers.
I couldn't tell you what the beta client rune page is running in that image and the only real way for me to tell is if I were to hover my mouse over them in the actual client.
